title: Cuyahoga Valley National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Be informed about Cuyahoga Valley National Park. Visit the links below for current information. Park Closures and Construction Projects  Be informed of trail, road, and facility closures outside of normal operations. Also listed are construction projects within the park that do not require a closure, but are of interest to our visitors. Click here to visit the Park Closures and Construction Projects webpage. News Releases News releases are sent to the media to inform them of important park news and events. Click here to access our News Releases webpage.  Social Media  Our Facebook account is located at www.facebook.com/CuyahogaValleyNationalPark. Fact Sheet  Read quick statistics about the park. Click here to download a pdf of the most current information available. Hot Topics  Read about park topics or projects that are of interest to the public. Click here to visit the Hot Topics webpage.
